Date: Tuesday, 4/15/1983
Subject: Trade offer
Dear Sir,
I would like to offer you following trade:
C Carmelo Herrero
in return for
1B Jesse Colwell, SP Christopher Schweitzer.

Please let me know if you accept!

Best Regards,
Plum Grove GM



Date: Monday, 5/5/1983
Subject: Progress of Jesse Colwell
Dear Sir,
Jesse Colwell has an AVG of .308 at AA San Ramon Beavers!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Wednesday, 5/21/1983
Subject: Daniel Connery healing process
Daniel Connery is not recovering as fast as I have
hoped! So expect his injury to last about 14 more days.

Regards,
Team Doctor



Date: Tuesday, 5/27/1983
Subject: Contract
Dear Sir,

Regards,
Donald Robinson



Date: Wednesday, 6/4/1983
Subject: Status of Ricky Cobble
Dear Sir,
Ricky Cobble isn't hitting the ball at all at AA San Ramon Beavers!
He has an AVG of .249, so a demotion is
the right choice. He shouldn't be emberassed any more.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 6/5/1983
Subject: Contract extension question
Dear Sir,
My contract expires after this season.
I would like to resign, so please let's talk!

Regards,
Franky Alvarez
